short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will send messages to businesses via multiple social sites, automatically.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Social Sender Chrome extension will allow you to message local businesses via multiple social media platforms automatically on a schedule.
